EmailTemplate.description: Welcome email sent to new My Camp Quality Portal members (families and volunteers) as of 2022
EmailTemplate.name: Welcome v2
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to {!Community_Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Welcome to your new My Camp Quality portal!
Through this portal you will be able to manage your registrations to Camp Quality programs and services, with just a few clicks on either your phone, tablet or PC.
To get started in navigating your way through this exciting portal, please go to www.mycampquality.org.au to log in.
Your username is your email address: {!Receiving_User.Username}
Click on Password Help and follow the instructions to set your password.
Once you have activated your account you can access the portal by going to www.mycampquality.org.au at any time.
Once logged in you can review your families details under the Profile tab, and you'll find useful links, policies and most commonly asked questions under our Resources and FAQ tabs.
If you do have any issues with logging into your portal please contact us on 1300 662 267.
Kind Regards, Camp Quality
You are receiving this email as you are a registered Camp Quality Family or Volunteer. To manage your invites update your profile at www.mycampquality.org.au.
